name: Space survival (itch) (djokavex)
description:
Survive as long as you can by killing enemies with your lasers!

Use the arrow keys to move, left mouse to shot standard lasers and right mouse for powerfull laser beam (but need to charge the reactor).

The beam reactor charge automatically with the time.

The shield restore automatically with the time.

Assets are from Kenney.

Source code can be found here: https://gitlab.com/djokavex_gamedev/jams/trijam86
